subject: Task Proposal: Generate Import Graph for Orphan Analysis

body.name: Generate import-graph.json for Orphaned File Analysis
body.description: Investigate and locate the script responsible for generating `import-graph.json` (likely within `scripts/auditing/` or `scripts/analysis/`). Execute the script to create the required `import-graph.json` file needed as input for `scripts/auditing/find_orphaned_files.py` (Task ORPHANED-FILE-SWEEP-001).
